ResourceHeader.Description:
Defense Meteorological Satellite Program, DMSP-F17 17th flight unit of the DMSP Block
   5D series, 3rd of the Block 5D-3 series. Main missions: cloud imagery and microwave
   imaging/temperature/humidity sounding. Substantial contribution to Space weather. Each DMSP satellite
   has a 101 minute, sun-synchronous near-polar orbit at an altitude of 830km above the surface of the earth.
         The local time nodes for DMSP F17 are 17:34 and 05:34.   
   Satellite reassigned as primary operational following the loss of DMSP-19 in Feb 2016.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: DMSP Data Manager, NOAA National Environmental Satellite, Data, and Information Service, NESDIS
